UNIDAO combines the best decentralization and stability of stablecoins using an innovative & best-in-the-class design for stable-coins.
UNIDAO is totally focused on mass adoption,
Our vision is to reach countries with very high demand for stable coins first like Lebanon, Nigeria, Turkey, Argentina etc.
Combined with lowest transfer fees and our partnerships with established ecosystems, UNIDAO aims to cross 1 Million

Combined with the lowest transfer fees and our partnerships with established ecosystems, UNIDAO aims to cross 10 Million users in the first year of operation and 100 Million users in the next.
UNIDAO aims to the first stable-coin to reach 1 Billion users.
UDAO token acts as a governance and Defi token with APY of 15-50%. NFTs & Play-to-Earn Games UNIDAO will host 100s of NFT platforms and play-to-Earn game dapp developers[/vc_column_text][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=igpxx-lrpQc” style=”style_2″ lightbox=”enable” title=”Watch video” subtitle=”About UNIDAO”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5518″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”158″ md_spacing=”120″ sm_spacing=”80″ xs_spacing=”60″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1532004587981{background-color: #eef2f5 !important;}”][vc_column][stm_spacing lg_spacing=”149″ md_spacing=”120″ sm_spacing=”80″ xs_spacing=”60″][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_custom_heading icon_pos=”top” text=”MARKET SIZE FOR StableCoins” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1643016756103{margin-top: -10px !important;}”]

Term of token sale: 75 days with the possibility of an automatic early completion in pursuing the final goals of ICO
Expanded goals after start of ICO: Impossible
Technical limitation of tokens: 300,000,000
Adjustable emission: All unsold and unallocated tokens will bе destroyed and additional release оf tokens will not be possible
Secured ways to purchase tokens: Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), fiat payments
Hardcap: $47,000,000
